title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message:
Hi, got an 820-3115-B with green light (no orange light with battery connected), no chime, no image. Connecting the charger fan goes on and after a while full throttle.

C6226 was corroded and was replaced. 

Replaced BIOS chip just in case. 

Every rail until PP1V05_S0 is present. PPBUS_G3H is a bit low 12.2v

PPVCORE_S0_CPU is 0v. 

ALL_SYS_PWRGD is 3.3v

PLT_RESET_L is 0v

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message:
Seems to have SMC issue.
Do you get correct AVREF_SMC?

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message: Check voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message:
Diode mode:

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA 0.461

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SCL 0.462

Votalge:

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA: 3.475v

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SCL: 3.475v

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message:
Did you change DCIN board?
If yes, then change SMC.

Just in case, test disconnecting BIL.

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message:
Yes, i tried another DCIN board.

Im sorry, what do you mean by disconnecting BIL? All the measurements were made with battery disconnected.

title: 820-3115-B green light, fan spins, no boot
message: Try disconnecting J6955, just in case.
